ygData.messageBody:
At 11:11 PM 5/14/99 +0200, you wrote:

My point is that increasing mana flow benefits your class more then others
because more mana for you equals more damage. For me mmore mana means more
debuffs but sicne most of my debuffs dont' stack i would have to cast more
of my much less efficient direct damage spells. Thus the change benefits you
far more then me.
As for using all your mana, again let the tank take some hits. Everyone in
the group should put something in, learn to hold back and let the tank tank
and the healer heal. You may think this will slow you down but overall you
will be ready for more fights sooner.
